Experience

Situated on the water’s edge behind the Cape Fold Mountains, The Thatch House is a country-style boutique hotel that sits on 7 acres of private land, with direct access to a beautiful lagoon.
Between July & November each year, Hermanus is known to offer the best land-based whale watching in the world, so families, groups of friends & discerning travellers choose this elegant & peaceful retreat as their Whale Coast haven.
This boutique hotel has been designed to showcase the natural beauty of the surrounding landscape while still retaining the warm, home-away-from-home family-style atmosphere.
Guests will have a wide selection of facilities to take advantage of, including 2 swimming pools, a tennis court, putting green & children’s playroom – as well as an in-house chef & full-time staff.
The Thatch House can also be booked on an exclusive-use basis by large groups or multi-generational families who are travelling together.

Stay

The Thatch House consists of 4 two-bedroom suites & 2 one-bedroom suites.
The two-bedroom suites can sleep 4 people, so are ideal for families. These suites include separate lounge areas & private patios with beautiful views over either the lagoon or manicured gardens.
The one-bedroom suites open out onto beautiful gardens. One of these suites includes an extra sofa bed for 2 children.
The Thatch House boasts 2 swimming pools, a floodlit tennis court, a putting green 7 a croquet lawn. There is also a jungle gym, games room with snooker table & movies as well as a small gym complete with jacuzzi. Communal areas also include a lounge & dining area, cocktail bar, library & TV room.

Activities

Activities include whale watching, kayaking on the lagoon, cliff walks & wine tasting.
Guests can also enjoy lazy strolls on the beach, boat-based fishing, golfing or browsing the shops of one of South Africa’s most popular holiday towns

subfolders.title: Birkenhead House
subfolders.description: Set on dramatic cliffs in Hermanus, with stunning views of Walker Bay, Birkenhead House is an opulent & luxurious beachfront retreat that offers some of the best land-based whale watching in the world. Tastefully designed & decorated by the owner, Liz Biden, the retreat is the epitome of elegant seaside luxury.

subfolders.title: Farm 215
subfolders.description: Farm 215 is a luxurious eco-friendly farm retreat that is so unique, it is in a class of its own.  Located off-the-beaten-track along the Whale Coast, guests will be immersed in nature – an ideal place to switch off & truly relax. Designed in keeping with its beautiful surroundings, Farm 215’s elegant suites boast lovely views over the fynbos reserve & an organic vegetable & herb garden produces fresh farm-to-table meals.

subfolders.title: Grootbos Forest Lodge
subfolders.description: Grootbos Nature Reserve is a private eco-reserve located on the beautiful Whale Coast & boasts  three 5-star accommodation options, each designed to reflect the exquisite natural setting without compromising on style & luxury.

subfolders.title: Lekkerwater Beach Lodge
subfolders.description: Set in a beautiful corner of the De Hoop Nature Reserve, Lekkerwater Beach Lodge offers guests a modern, eco-friendly stay in a spectacular ocean-front location. The area is renowned for its excellent land-based whale watching, but against the backdrop of flower-filled fynbos vegetation & distant purple mountains, De Hoop is also home to other animals like baboons, ostriches & eland as well as dolphins, tortoises & sea birds.

subfolders.title: Morukuru Ocean House
subfolders.description: Boasting a secluded setting in the pristine De Hoop Nature Reserve, Morukuru Ocean House is an exclusive-use beach villa that offers an unspoilt, private & luxurious stay. The area is renowned for its excellent land-based whale watching, but against the backdrop of flower-filled fynbos vegetation & distant purple mountains, De Hoop is also home to other animals like baboons, ostriches & eland as well as dolphins, tortoises & sea birds.

subfolders.title: Ocean Eleven Guest House
subfolders.description: Ocean Eleven Guest House is located within the heart of whale-watching country on a fynbos-covered, ocean-facing cliff in Hermanus – one of the most sought-after locations along the Whale Route.   From this elegant beach house, exceptional views across Walker Bay can be enjoyed.

subfolders.title: One Marine Drive Boutique Hotel
subfolders.description: One Marine Drive Boutique Hotel is situated on the oceanfront of Hermanus – a quaint coastal town that offers the best land-based whale watching in the world. Small & intimate, this boutique hotel offers only 5 suites with sensational views over the ocean -the perfect place from which to witness frolicking whales between July & November each year.

subfolders.title: Schulphoek House
subfolders.description: Sculphoek House is located within the protected sanctuary of Schulphoek Bay, just outside the charming seaside town of Hermanus.   Situated right on the beach, Schulphoek does not only offer spectacular views of the ocean but also provides the ideal spot to enjoy excellent whale watching from the comfort of the lounge or outside terrace.

subfolders.title: The Marine
subfolders.description: The Marine is a landmark in Hermanus - a quaint little seaside town along South Africa’s beautiful Whale Route.   This ocean-front property boasts a spectacular clifftop setting with captivating views of Walker Bay & its frolicking whales.  Between July & November each year, guests can experience the best land-based whale watching in the world from the comfort of the deck.
